ingredients: 4 ounces of dried spaghetti or pasta noodles of your choice (I used gluten free pasta)
2 flowing cups of baby spinach,roughly chopped
1 bunch (about 10 to 12 leaves) basil, roughly chopped
½ teaspoon of sea salt or to taste
½ teaspoon of black pepper or to taste
¼ cup of grated Parmesan cheese plus more for garnish (I used Salerno Cheese)
¼ teaspoon red pepper flakes optional
1 peperoncino chili pepper or red chili pepper of your choice, deseeded and finely chopped (optional)
extra virgin olive oil for frying
